titles.title: A bill to extend until December 31, 1994, the deadline for the State of Pennsylvania to submit certain provisions of a Clean Air Act implementation plan applicable to the Liberty Borough PM-10 Nonattainment Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6869-6870)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 5/28/1993--Introduced. Extends the deadline for implementation plan submissions for particulate matter-10 (PM-10) under the Clean Air Act until December 31, 1994, with respect to the Liberty Borough Nonattainment Area in western Pennsylvania.
